data.text:
2023-24 Men's Rowing - Heavyweight Roster

Choose a Player:

Patrick Shanahan/Cornell Athletics

Jackson Stone

Class Senior

Hometown Newton, Mass.

Highschool Belmont Hill School

Bio

Historical

Biography

2023-24 | SENIOR SEASON

Split time during spring season between 3V8+ and 4V8+ crews ... earned first-place finish with 4V8+ at Goes Trophy (April 20) against Navy and Syracuse ... competed with 4V8+ at Eastern Sprints (May 19) and 3V8+ at IRA National Championship (May 31-June 2) ... did not race during fall season.

2020-21

Season canceled due to COVID-19 pandemic

2019-20 | FRESHMAN SEASON

Rowed from second seat on Big Red’s men’s championship eight boat at Head of the Charles Regatta, helping Cornell post time of 14:54.47 ... competed on Cornell 4V4+ boat in Flight 1 at Cornell Autumn Classic, as team completed race in 12:59.53 ... guided Cornell 2V8+ boat to top-10 finish in Flight 2 at Cornell Autumn Classic, as squad placed 10th out of 22 boats with time of 11:48.43 ... spring 2020 season canceled due to COVID-19.

PRIOR TO CORNELL

Represented United States in the men’s coxed 4 at World Rowing Junior Championships in Tokyo, Japan in 2019 ... four-year letterman on rowing team at Belmont Hill School, being elected team captain in 2019 ... helped team to New England Championship Team Points Trophy in 2016 and 2019 ... three-sport athlete at Belmont Hill School, also having competed in three years of wrestling and cross country, earning two letters in each sport.

PERSONAL

Jackson Lee Evans Stone is the son of Lee and Laura Stone, and has an older sister ... mother, Laura, rowed collegiately at Wisconsin ... enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences.

Historical Player Information
